thumb.title: The Vidya News & Showcase: April 30, 2025
thumb.description: Begin my adventure in The Zone with the first S.T.A.L.K.E.R. video game, and then transition to discussions surrounding game preservation and development costs. New streams are every week at 1 PM Pacific time, which you can watch here: http://8chan.tv/streamer/36
thumb.last_res_body: Please remove the search tags. This video does not contain any Switch2 or Fallout content.
